long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Pashto thesaurus to help find similar words to the word in query. Its created with automated mechanism using machine learning on Pashto language journals. Its a low resourced language and providing a browser extension for its thesaurus will be very helpful for end users. It currently has two features. When a word is typed / pasted in the input box, its similar words are returned. While since it currently has only limited words (6000) the context menu helps in finding meaning of the selected word in English.
